issues.description: The problem statement specifies a method named addToStockIngredients in the Stock class, but the template repository implements a method with the same signature under the name addItem. This discrepancy could confuse students, as they might not know whether to rename the existing method or add a new one to match the required design, potentially leading to implementation errors when trying to use it in SealSaloon.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the method in the template repository from addItem to addToStockIngredients to align with the problem statement and solution, ensuring students can directly use the method without modification and reducing confusion about the intended design.
